teaser: Airing on Friday, April 17, 2015:  First, we talk with Edith Ramirez, Chairwoman of the FTC, about regulating the sharing economy. And this week, we play Silicon Tally with Annalee Newitz, Editor-In-Chief of Gizmodo.

title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, April 17, 2015
